narrative.title: 7Th Armoured Division - 1941Q4

operations.name: Operation Crusader
operations.role: Primary armoured strike force under XXX Corps
operations.outcome: Objective achieved - relief of Tobruk. Heavy tank losses (nearly wiped out at Sidi Rezegh 19-23 Nov)

situation.combat_effectiveness: High combat experience but severely depleted during Crusader. Started operation with 445 tanks, reduced to approximately 100 operational by end of November. Reformed and continued operations through December.
notable_engagements: Bir el Gubi (19 November 1941 - 22nd Armoured Brigade vs Ariete Division)

narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
